title: 90 Minutes
overview: When Las Navajas, a once-legendary amateur soccer team, is shaken by a scandalous brawl, their aging owner recruits washed-up local legend "Veneno" Montoya to coach the underdogs through a tournament filled with bitter rivalries, mafia threats, and impossible oddsâ€”igniting a wild journey to reclaim their honor and restore their neighborhood's pride.
